text: @BarryKillnerEA @maggie_colledge @WorcsTravel @EnvAgencyMids I live at Severnside Mill and I can guarantee that my neighbours and fellow Bewdley dwellers would prefer a little inconvenience in the short term than their houses flooded when all of the melted Welsh snow comes cascading down the Severn in a day or two!

@greenbeltsal @EnvAgency @YNET4 @EnvAgencyYNE @northyorkscc As someone who grew up in York, floods like these were at least a yearly event. Seemingly it is happening a lot more frequently now. 

But what is the link with EA and development which is causing this to happen more frequently?

RT @TelfordWrekin: ‚úÖ And in other news ‚úÖ 

The @EnvAgencyMids have now taken down then flood barriers on The Wharfage in #Ironbridge

We ar‚Ä¶
Huge thanks to all at the @EnvAgency for their continued work to protect us all. https://t.co/YSJ3TVqvZB
